alert.note: Alert for Brown (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 03 at 8:13PM CDT until June 05 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... La Moine River at Ripley. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...La Moine River at Ripley. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, FLOOD STAGE. Farmland flooding and rural damages begin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed La Moine River Ripley 22.0 21.6 22.0 19.9 16.4 12.9 10.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
